Name: Increase Team Velocity
Description: Maximize the average story points completed per sprint

Name: Minimize Defects
Description: Reduce number of high-severity bugs detected

Name: Minimize Time to Market
Description: Shorten duration from project start to first release

Name: Maximize Feature Throughput
Description: Increase number of features delivered per release

Name: Minimize Budget Variance
Description: Keep actual spend close to planned budget

Name: Maximize Team Utilization
Description: Increase percentage of billable team hours

Name: Minimize Technical Debt
Description: Reduce count of known technical debt items

Name: Maximize Release Frequency
Description: Increase number of releases per quarter

Name: Minimize Sprint Spillover
Description: Reduce number of carry-over stories to next sprint
